title: NEED HELP
body: i've started playing league here on NA server i'm from philippines .. i want to explore the world how do they play .. what are their characteristics  but i can't enjoy the game because of technical issues or something (lag) .. my stable ping was like 230 .. rip :( any suggestions/ solutions .. i've already created a request from riot .. but no one is answering until today especially Human .. thanks in advance ..

replies.body:
You're *pretty far away* from the server geologically, so this will play a big factor in the latency you can achieve on the NA server. Since you've already reached out in a support ticket, I recommend waiting to hear back from one of our tech specialists so they can assist you in taking a look at this.

Let me know if you have any questions.

thank you for your response .. :)
i also know that im far from the server maybe at least i can lower down the latency that i have ..
